doc:
Marco Perella https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Marco_Perella 0 Marco Perella (born May 18, 1949) is an American character actor and author, who has played a variety of small roles in motion pictures shot in Texas. He is best known for his role in Boyhood (2014), playing an abusive alcoholic second husband, Professor Bill Welbrock, and for his bestselling book, Adventures of A No Name Actor (2001), a humorous autobiography recounting his struggles in the acting world. Marco_Perella ( born May_18_,_1949 ) is an_American_character_actor_and_author , who has_played a_variety of small_roles in motion_pictures shot in Texas .
